name: kgbpeople
overview:
kgbpeople offer a global search for people facility for free. Search for long lost friends and relatives or your favourite movie stars and musicians and more importantly find out what is stored online about you.

The kgbpeople.com site trawls through social networks like Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn and others to bring back detailed results on the person being queried.

It also searches Flickr and YouTube for images and videos and allows registered users to leave messages for friends and relatives and to pass on useful sources of information.

kgbpeople also gives consumers the opportunity to edit the information that is returned by creating a profile and commenting on each result.”

For consumers, kgbpeople should prove particularly useful in instances where online information that others may see about them is wrong, outdated, or about someone else entirely. Consumers using kgbpeople can set alerts so that they receive an email whenever their name comes up on a long list of Web sites, search engines, and social media sites.

Consumers can also set up personal profiles that enable them to refute information that may be wrong or damaging to their reputations. In an era where reputation management is increasingly difficult, kgbpeople can help consumers protect themselves, and respond quickly to misinformation online.

external_links.title: kgb Launches People Search Engine www.kgbpeople.com
